column.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
column.Name: Client

column.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
column.Name: Organization

column.Help: The Created field indicates the date that this record was created.
column.Name: Created

column.Help: The Created By field indicates the user who created this record.
column.Name: Created By

column.Description: The record is active in the system
column.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
column.Name: Active

column.Help: The Updated field indicates the date that this record was updated.
column.Name: Updated

column.Help: The Updated By field indicates the user who updated this record.
column.Name: Updated By

column.Help: A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
column.Name: Business Partner

column.Description: Identifies the (ship to) address for this Business Partner
column.Help: The Partner address indicates the location of a Business Partner
column.Name: Partner Location

column.ColumnSQL: (SELECT pl.value||'.'||pl.name from LCO_DIAN_SendSchedule ss INNER JOIN LCO_DIAN_FieldFormat ff ON ss.LCO_DIAN_Format_ID = ff.LCO_DIAN_Format_ID INNER JOIN LCO_DIAN_XMLPrintLabel pl ON ff.LCO_DIAN_XMLPrintLabel_ID = pl.LCO_DIAN_XMLPrintLabel_ID WHERE ss.LCO_DIAN_SendSchedule_ID = LCO_DIAN_SendScheduleLine.LCO_DIAN_SendSchedule_ID AND ff.CalcColumnPosition = 1)
column.Help: Identifier of the attribute
column.Name: Attribute Name 1

column.ColumnSQL: (SELECT pl.value||'.'||pl.name from LCO_DIAN_SendSchedule ss INNER JOIN LCO_DIAN_FieldFormat ff ON ss.LCO_DIAN_Format_ID = ff.LCO_DIAN_Format_ID INNER JOIN LCO_DIAN_XMLPrintLabel pl ON ff.LCO_DIAN_XMLPrintLabel_ID = pl.LCO_DIAN_XMLPrintLabel_ID WHERE ss.LCO_DIAN_SendSchedule_ID = LCO_DIAN_SendScheduleLine.LCO_DIAN_SendSchedule_ID AND ff.CalcColumnPosition = 2)

column.Name: Attribute Name 2

field.Name: Client
field.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.

field.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

field.Name: Active
field.Description: The record is active in the system
field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

column.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

column.Help: The Processed checkbox indicates that a document has been processed.
column.Name: Processed

column.Help: The Year uniquely identifies an accounting year for a calendar.
column.Name: Year

column.Help: The Start Date indicates the first or starting date
column.Name: Start Date

column.Help: The End Date indicates the last date in this range.
column.Name: End Date

column.Help: The Generated checkbox identifies a journal line that was generated from a source document. Lines could also be entered manually or imported.
column.Name: Generated

field.Name: Client
field.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.

field.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

field.Name: Year

field.Name: Start Date
field.Help: The Start Date indicates the first or starting date

field.Name: End Date
field.Help: The End Date indicates the last date in this range.

field.Name: Generated
field.Help: The Generated checkbox identifies a journal line that was generated from a source document. Lines could also be entered manually or imported.

field.Name: Processed
field.Help: The Processed checkbox indicates that a document has been processed.

field.Name: Active
field.Description: The record is active in the system
field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

column.Description: Search key for the record in the format required - must be unique
column.Help: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
column.Name: Search Key

column.Help: The Created field indicates the date that this record was created.
column.Name: Created

column.Help: The Created By field indicates the user who created this record.
column.Name: Created By

column.Description: Optional short description of the record
column.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.

E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

column.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.

column.Name: Updated

column.Help: The Updated By field indicates the user who updated this record.
column.Name: Updated By

column.Description: Optional Reporting Hierarchy - If not selected the default hierarchy trees are used.
column.Help: Reporting Hierarchy allows you to select different Hierarchies/Trees for the report. Accounting Segments like Organization, Account, Product may have several hierarchies to accomodate different views on the business.
column.Name: Reporting Hierarchy

column.Help: An Accounting Schema defines the rules used in accounting such as costing method, currency and calendar
column.Name: Accounting Schema

column.Help: The Sequence defines the numbering sequence to be used for documents.
column.Name: Sequence

column.DefaultValue: @SQL=SELECT COALESCE(MAX(Line),0)+10 AS DefaultValue FROM LCO_DIAN_FieldFormat WHERE LCO_DIAN_Format_ID=@LCO_DIAN_Format_ID@
column.Help: Indicates the unique line for a document. It will also control the display order of the lines within a document.
column.Name: Line No

column.Help: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
column.Name: Search Key

field.Name: Client
field.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.

field.Name: Organization
field.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

field.Name: Search Key
field.Description: Search key for the record in the format required - must be unique
field.Help: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

field.Name: Name
field.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.

field.Name: Active
field.Description: The record is active in the system
field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

column.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
column.Name: Client

column.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
column.Name: Organization

column.Help: The Created field indicates the date that this record was created.
column.Name: Created

column.Help: The Created By field indicates the user who created this record.
column.Name: Created By

column.Help: Sum of all amounts

field.Name: Business Partner
field.Help: A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson

field.Help: The Partner address indicates the location of a Business Partner

SQLStatement.statement: UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Línea Envío' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Send Schedule (DIAN)' and t.name='Send Schedule Line') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Programación Envío' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Send Schedule (DIAN)' and t.name='Send Schedule') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Formato' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Format (DIAN)' and t.name='Format') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Conceptos Formato' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Format (DIAN)' and t.name='Concept Format') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Campos Formato' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Format (DIAN)' and t.name='Field Format') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Concepto' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Concept (DIAN)' and t.name='Concept') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Fuente' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Concept (DIAN)' and t.name='Source') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Rótulo XML' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='XML Print Label (DIAN)' and t.name='XML Print Label') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Encabezado XML' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='XML Media (DIAN)' and t.name='XML Header') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Contenido XML' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='XML Media (DIAN)' and t.name='XML Content') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tabla Conversión' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Conversion Table' and t.name='Conversion') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Código' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Conversion Table' and t.name='Code') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Medios Magnéticos (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Magnetic Media (DIAN)' and m.action IS NULL) AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Programación Envíos (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Send Schedule (DIAN)' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Formato (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Format (DIAN)' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Concepto (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Concept (DIAN)' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Rótulo XML (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='XML Print Label (DIAN)' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Medio XML (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='XML Media (DIAN)' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tabla Conversión' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Conversion Table' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Programación Envíos (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='Send Schedule (DIAN)') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Formato (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='Format (DIAN)') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Concepto (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='Concept (DIAN)') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Rótulo XML (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='XML Print Label (DIAN)') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Medio XML (DIAN)' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='XML Media (DIAN)') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tabla Conversión' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='Conversion Table') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Ref_List_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Inserción' WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=(SELECT AD_ref_list_ID FROM AD_reference r, ad_ref_list rl WHERE r.ad_reference_id=rl.ad_reference_id and r.name='LCO_SendConceptCode' and rl.name='Insertion') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Ref_List_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Sustitución' WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=(SELECT AD_ref_list_ID FROM AD_reference r, ad_ref_list rl WHERE r.ad_reference_id=rl.ad_reference_id and r.name='LCO_SendConceptCode' and rl.name='Substitution') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Message_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', MsgText='Archivo generado' WHERE AD_Message_ID=(SELECT AD_message_ID FROM AD_message w WHERE w.value='LCO_FileGenerated') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Message_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', MsgText='Lineas adicionadas' WHERE AD_Message_ID=(SELECT AD_message_ID FROM AD_message w WHERE w.value='LCO_LinesInserted') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Message_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', MsgText='Medios XML adicionados' WHERE AD_Message_ID=(SELECT AD_message_ID FROM AD_message w WHERE w.value='LCO_MediaInserted') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Process_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Generar Medio XML' WHERE AD_Process_ID=(SELECT AD_process_ID FROM AD_process w WHERE w.value='LCO_DianGenerateXML') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Process_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Procesar Contenido' WHERE AD_Process_ID=(SELECT AD_process_ID FROM AD_process w WHERE w.value='LCO_DianProcessContent') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Process_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Exportar a XML' WHERE AD_Process_ID=(SELECT AD_process_ID FROM AD_process w WHERE w.value='LCO_DianExportXML') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Process_Para_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Adjunta XML' WHERE AD_Process_Para_ID=(SELECT AD_Process_Para_ID FROM AD_Process p, AD_Process_Para pp WHERE p.ad_process_id=pp.ad_process_id and p.value='LCO_DianExportXML' and pp.name='Attach XML') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Línea Programación', PrintName='Línea Programación' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_DIAN_SendScheduleLine_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Formato', PrintName='Formato' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_DIAN_Format_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='URL XSD', PrintName='URL XSD' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='URL_XSD') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
